note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
Copyright (c) 2012 Jarek Szczepanski

sound generation based on flex-morse project - http://code.google.com/p/flex-morse/
Icons - Subway Icons Set - http://subway.pixle.pl/

Versions:
* 1.7   - clean up for BB10 SDK
* 1.6.3 - fixed broken training mode
* 1.6.2 - added sound encoding to WAV and MP3 files
* 1.6.1 - added "Post to Twitter" functionality
* 1.6.0 - fixed "Post to Facebook" dialog window. Added label with OK message after successful copy into clipboard
* 1.5.0 - added buttons: "Copy to clipboard" and "Post to Facebook"
* 1.1.0 - rewrited with RobotLegs framework
name: Morse Code Generator
